definitions.text: a vague idea in which some confidence is placed
examples: his impression of her was favorable
what are your feelings about the crisis?
it strengthened my belief in his sincerity
I had a feeling that she was lying

definitions.text: an odd or fanciful or capricious idea
examples: the theatrical notion of disguise is associated with disaster in his stories
he had a whimsy about flying to the moon
whimsy can be humorous to someone with time to enjoy it

definitions.text: (usually plural) small personal articles or clothing or sewing items
